title: SPARK: Search Personalization via Agent-Driven Retrieval and Knowledge-sharing
dimension: Adaptation to Rapidly Evolving AI Threat Landscape
summary: Personalized search demands the ability to model users' evolving, multi-dimensional information needs; a challenge for systems constrained by static profiles or monolithic retrieval pipelines.
